tool_description: Formats release notes and changelog content according to platform-specific guidelines and best practices for user engagement.

changes_list.description: List of changes, improvements, and bug fixes

release_type.description: Type of release: major, minor, patch, or hotfix

tone.description: Writing tone: professional, casual, or technical

error_messages: Invalid version format: Version number must follow semantic versioning (e.g., 1.2.3).
Empty changes list: At least one change must be specified.
Invalid release type: Must be one of: major, minor, patch, or hotfix.
Invalid tone: Must be one of: professional, casual, or technical.
Changes too long: Individual change descriptions should be under 200 characters.
usage: Provide version_number, changes_list, and release_type. Optionally specify tone and highlight_features. Tool formats content for optimal user engagement and platform compliance.

character_count.description: Total character count of formatted notes
